summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2352, for the improvement of 32nd Avenue South from Yesler Way to Washington Street and Washington Street, from 32nd Avenue South to the east line of H. E. Holmes' Addition to the City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, constructing wooden curbs and gutters and concrete walks, together with all necessary cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 24364 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
